property.name: sqlPurge
property.value: DELETE FROM ${database.schema}.PTNETWORK WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT distinct ptnetworkid FROM ${database.schema}.line)

property.name: sqlInsert
property.value: INSERT INTO ${database.schema}.PTNETWORK ( objectid, objectversion, creationtime, creatorid, versiondate, description, name, registrationnumber, sourcename, sourceidentifier, COMMENT) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: sqlSelectByObjectIdWithInClause
property.value: SELECT id,objectid FROM ${database.schema}.PTNETWORK WHERE objectid IN (_OBJECTIDS_)

property.name: sqlUpdate
property.value: UPDATE ${database.schema}.PTNETWORK SET objectid = ?, objectversion = ?, creationtime = ?, creatorid = ?, versiondate = ?, description = ?, name = ?, registrationnumber = ?, sourcename = ?, sourceidentifier = ?, COMMENT = ? WHERE objectid = ?
